group_1.textCenter: Can't you tell just from Daito's reputation@and how the adults act?
They'd never believe someone from there!

group_1.narration: I fled, struggling to accept what I'd@just heard. My feet brought me to@a deserted science classroom...

group_1.textCenter: Hm? Someone in here already?
You... Ryo! What're you doing in the corner@of the room?
Waiting for another perfect shot, huh? Too@bad, I'm not gonna slip up at all today!

group_1.textLeft: (Hinano's here... Now what? I don't have the@energy to move.)

group_1.textRight: [chara:300301:motion_0][chara:300301:cheek_0][chara:300301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300301:lipSynch_1]What's wrong? You look really down.

group_1.textLeft: It's nothing...

group_1.textRight: Y'know, I'm here if you need someone to@listen.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think you'd get it even if I told you@what was wrong.

group_1.textRight: Maybe not.
But I'm a Magical Girl, same as you. I'd@probably understand better than most.

group_1.textLeft: M-Magical Girl?

group_1.textRight: Is this your first time meeting another one@of us?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.narration: I'd never met another Magical Girl before.@Maybe that's why I told her.
I told Hinano all about my wish,@how I was treated just because@I was from Daito,@and all kinds of other things.

group_1.textLeft: That's when I ran away...

group_1.textRight: That's rough.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, have you ever once thought "I'm glad I@became a Magical Girl"?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I have.

group_1.textLeft: How about "I wish I'd never become one"?

group_1.textRight: I've thought that too.
I've been a Magical Girl for quite a while,@you know.
I've experienced good and bad.

group_1.textLeft: Isn't that hard to deal with?
Always being faced with something terrible@right after something good happens?

group_1.textRight: It is hard, yeah. Sometimes it's so difficult@that I wanna run away.
Especially when there's nothing I can do @about it.

group_1.textLeft: Nothing you can do about it? @[chara:304601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304601:cheek_2][chara:304601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]Like what, exactly?

group_1.textRight: I don't really like thinking about it. But I@can, if it'll help a newbie in need.

group_1.narration: Hinano whispered her story to me as@though she was chastising herself over it.@It was about the territory wars in Kamihama,@when Witches were scarce. East fought West.

group_1.textLeft: So the Magical Girls in Chuo Ward were looked@down upon by other Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: Dunno if "looked down upon" is quite right...@It was more like no one had their backs.
There were people out there who figured that@since Witches were scarce, it'd be easier...
To steal Grief Seeds from weak, defenseless@Magical Girls, rather than hunting Witches.

group_1.textLeft: That's horrible...

group_1.textRight: Yeah it is.
But it was really brutal back then, see,@because everyone just wanted to survive.

group_1.textLeft: Do you think there was no other way?
That nothing could be done about the girls@who were getting abused like that?

group_1.textRight: No way!
I still wish I'd had more power back then.@All the time, even now.
If I'd been stronger, then maybe I could've@helped do something about it.
But sometimes, in this world we live in...
Just doing what's right isn't enough.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.5][chara:304601:eyeClose_0][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]That's tough.

group_1.textRight: It is. It's really tough. Tougher than the@trickiest chemical formula.
We've got to get by, somehow, all the same.
You just have to make your own decisions,@ones that you can live with.
I'm not saying you've gotta figure it out@right this second, you know?
It's okay if it takes some time to work out@what your answer is.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: But don't let someone else make your choices@for you, just because it's hard.
It's good to get other people's opinions on@stuff, but make the final call yourself.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: Yep. 'Cause your life, and the powers you@got from your contract? Those are yours.

group_1.textLeft: (My life and powers are mine, that's...true.@[wait:0.8][chara:304601:eyeClose_1][chara:304601:cheek_2][chara:304601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]She's got a point.)
I have to be the one who decides what I do@next, huh...
[chara:304601:lipSynch_1]I get it.

group_1.textRight: Oh, and while we're on the subject.
If you're stressed about where you grew up,@you should go talk with Kanagi Izumi.

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi Izumi?

group_1.textRight: She acts as a kind of leader for all the@Eastern Magical Girls.
I'm sure she'll take the time to listen to you.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll go see her.

group_1.textRight: Great!
For today though, just get yourself home.@Eat your dinner, take a nice bath, rest up.
That's the best cure for exhausted girls.

group_1.textLeft: Ha ha, are you serious? You're tiny but you@act just like a mom.

group_1.textRight: Don't comment on my height!

group_1.narration: I thought long and hard about how@to use the powers I'd been granted,@and how to deal with the reality@of being born a Daito resident.

group_1.textCenter: (There's no way I can bear all this@the way Hinano does.)
(And I can't live like a paragon of virtue@the way Kanagi does.)
(So all I can do is find my own way to keep@on moving ahead.)
(The burden I've carried since I was born@as a resident of Daito...)
(And the miracle Kyubey granted for me@when I met him...)
(I'll just say they cancel each other out.)
(Because I... Ryo Midori...)
I can use the power I was given to spread the@truth!
It's not about good or evil.
I can just make sure that the truth gets out@there in its simplest form.
It doesn't matter what people say.
I'll tell the truth as it is, good or bad.
That's what I'll use my powers for!
It doesn't matter how tiny that bit of truth@is, I'll capture it with my camera!

group_1.narration: My newfound determination helped me to@start something new.
The Gossip Club...@Otherwise known as the Newspaper Club.

group_1.textCenter: Here goes!

group_1.narration: Setting up the Gossip Club gave me@a brand new sense of determination.
Though I had no idea of the despair lying@ahead... Like the truth about Magical Girls.

group_1.textCenter: I'll get my hands on the evidence.@That's my motto!
